Appleton - Century
BOOK PUBLISHERS
60 EAST 42ND STREET
NEW YORK, NEW YORK 10017
YUKON 6-8700
CABLE: SWORD WORDS
April 10, 1964
Mr. James A. Fellows
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 36, D. C.
Dear Mr. Fellows:
Thank you for your letter of March 26th.
We are glad to grant you permission to quote
"The Flower-fed Buffaloes‚Äù from GOING TO THE STARS
by Vachel Lindsay without payment of fee.
Please place our copyright line, together with
acknowledgment to author, title, and ourselves as
publisher on the acknowledgment page of your study
booklet, and, if at all possible, make some
acknowledgment on your taped broadcasts.
Sincerely,
AM/mjc
Anne Miller
